categori ii (nation park) locat american samoa, usa nearest&#160;c pago pago coordin 14°15′30″ 170°41′00″w﻿ / ﻿14.25833° 170.68333°w﻿ / -14.25833; -170.68333coordinates: 14°15′30″ 170°41′00″w﻿ / ﻿14.25833° 170.68333°w﻿ / -14.25833; -170.68333 area 13,500 acr (5,500&#160;ha)[1] establish 1988-10-31 visitor 10,440 (in&#160;2012)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic http://www.nps.gov/npsa/ nation park american samoa nation park american territori american samoa, distribut across three separ islands: tutuila, ofu, ta‘ū. park preserv protect coral reefs, tropic rainforests, fruit bats, samoan culture. popular hike snorkeling. park' 13,500 acr (5,500&#160;ha), 9,000 acr (3,600&#160;ha) land 4,500 acr (1,800&#160;ha) coral reef ocean.[3] american nation park south equator. content 1 tutuila 2 manua island group 2.1 ofu unit 2.2 ta‘ū unit 3 biodivers 3.1 fauna 3.2 flora 3.3 marin 4 histori 5 geolog histori 6 threat 7 see also 8 refer 9 bibliographi 10 extern link tutuila[edit] pola tai (cock' comb) vatia bay, nation park american samoa, tutuila. beach ofu. tutuila unit park north end island near pago pago. separ mount alava (1,610 feet (490&#160;m)) maugaloa ridg includ amalau valley, craggi point, tafeu cove, island pola manofa. part park access car attract vast major visitor area. park land includ trail top mount alava histor world war ii gun emplac site breaker point blunt' point.[4] trail run along ridg dens forest, north land slope steepli away ocean.[5] manua island group[edit] ofu unit[edit] ofu island access via small fisherman boat ta'u island. accommod avail ofu. ta‘ū unit[edit] ta‘ū island reach flight tutuila fiti‘uta villag ta‘ū. accommod avail ta‘ū. trail run saua around si’u point southern coastlin stair 3,170-foot (970&#160;m) summit lata mountain. biodiversity[edit] remot location, divers among terrestri speci low. approxim 30% plant one bird speci (the samoan starling) endem archipelago.[6] many-colour fruit-dov found park. fauna[edit] three speci bat nativ mammals: two larg fruit bat (samoa fli fox white-nap fli fox) small insectivore, pacif sheath-tail bat. serv import role pollin island' plants. sheath-tail bat nearli elimin cyclon val 1991. nativ reptil includ pelag gecko, polynesian gecko, mourn gecko, stump-to gecko, pacif boa seven skink species.[7] major role park control erad invas plant anim speci feral pigs, threaten park' ecosystem. sever bird species, predomin wattl honeyeater, samoan starling, pacif pigeon.[8] unusu bird includ tahiti petrel, spotless crake, rare (in locality) many-colour fruit dove.[6] flora[edit] island mostli cover tropic rainforest, includ cloud forest ta'u lowland ridg forest tutuila. plant arriv chanc southeast asia. 343 flower plants, 135 fern 30% endem plant species. marine[edit] surround water fill divers marin life, includ sea turtles, humpback whales, 950 speci fish, 250 coral species. largest live coral coloni (porites) world ta'u island. history[edit] nation park american samoa establish octob 31, 1988 public law 100-571[9] np could buy land tradit commun land system. resolv septemb 9, 1993, nation park servic enter 50-year leas park land samoan villag councils. 2002, congress approv thirti percent expans olosega ofu islands.[10] 2009 earthquak tsunami produc sever larg waves, result 34 confirm deaths, hundr injuri destruct 200 home businesses. park encount major damage. visitor center main offic destroy one report injuri among np staff volunteers.[11] geolog history[edit] volcan island samoa domin acreag nation park compos shield volcano develop hot spot pacif plate, emerg sequenti west east. tutulia, largest oldest island, probabl date pliocen epoch, approxim 1.24 1.4 million year ago, smaller island like holocen age. island made individu volcanoes, rather compos overlap superimpos shield volcano built basalt lava flows. much lava erupt sinc broken angular fragment known breccia. volcano emerg intrus basalt dike rift zone ocean floor pliocen epoch, heavili erod pliocen earli pleistocen epochs, leav behind trachyt plug expos outcrop volcan tuff throughout park. ta'u island, youngest island includ within nation park, remain collaps shield volcano holocen time. collaps produc sea cliff 3,000 feet high north side island, highest escarp world. samoan island shown evid volcan mani years, hot spot beneath island continu give indic activity, submarin erupt detect east american samoa 1973. vailulu'u seamount, locat east ta'u, futur samoan island develop submarin lava flows, continu eastward progress volcan develop hotspot islands. lava flow form seamount date radiometr method 5 50 years, time seamount risen 14,764 feet ocean floor. evid exist past submarin surfac landslid result weather form eros rock soil make islands. ta'u island, inland escarp known liu bench (a featur mass wasting) threaten slump nearbi ocean, event could produc tsunami strong enough devast island fiji southeast.[12] threats[edit] coral reef signific threat due rise ocean temperatur carbon dioxid concentration, well sea level rise. result stresses, coral form reef project lost mid-centuri carbon dioxid concentr continu rise current rate.[13] see also[edit] samoan plant name list bird samoa old vatia, import archaeolog site park references[edit] ^ "list acreag decemb 31, 2011". land resourc division, nation park service. retriev fagasa failolo faleasao faleniu fatumafuti futiga 'ili'ili lauli'i leloaloa leon leusoali'i luma maia malaeimi malaeloa/aitulagi malaeloa/ituau maloata mapusagaf masausi masefau matu'u mesepa nu'uuli
